column4: Hi all.  I'm trying to install a fresh copy of Gutsy on a new home-built PC, but I'm experiencing crashes/lockups related to video problems.  The graphics chipset in use is the Intel 950 series.  I've tried both the intel experimental drivers (which cause a freeze with visual irregularities shortly after boot), and the i810 drivers (which result in low resolutions, and when i try to change the resolutions, GDM crashes and won't rest
that's odd.. I thought intels graphics chips had good support under linux
